Greater Command (Leadership5 Ench): R75' 20 targets in 15' radius obey self commands to approach, drop, fall, flee, or halt for 20 rd (DC 17 Will neg)

Instant Summons (Language7 Conj): Prepared object appears in self hand
Prayer (Leadership3 Ench): Allies in 40' radius gain +1 attack, damage, save, and skill, and foes suffer -1, for 20 rd
Repulsion (Leadership7 Abju): Creatures stay 200' away for 20 rd (DC 19 Will neg)
Share Language (Language2 Divi): Touched can use 6 languages self knows for 1 dy
Storm Of Vengeance (Leadership9 Conj): R1200' 360' radius storm deafens for 1d4x10 min (DC 21 Fort neg), then rains acid inflicting 1d6 HP, then generates 6 bolts lightning that inflict 10d6 HP each (DC 21 Ref half), then hail that inflicts 5d6 HP, then obscures vision for 6 rd
Symbol Of Death (Language8 Necr): R60' Rune slays (DC 20 Fort neg) in 60' radius when triggered for 200 min or 150 HP killed
Telepathic Bond (Language5 Divi): R75' Self and/or 6 willing targets in 15' diameter share thoughts for 200 min
Teleportation Circle (Language9 Conj): Transports creatures in 5' radius anywhere w/no error chance for 200 min
Tongues (Language3 Divi): Touched communicate in any language for 200 min
